name: Random
description: Random (RNDM) is the principle currency supporting Fractal Studios’ multi-platform ecosystem of dApps & games. RNDM also offers no-lock staking at a minimum 1% apr monthly, as well as 1% bonus drops, awarded completely at random. The token’s primary use case, Lexicon: The Chaos of Cantor, is a digital trading card game that is currently in development. Beta is scheduled for mid 2022.
